name: lexin-chrome-extension
description: Swedish to other languages dictionary. Powered by Lexin and Folkets Lexikon

scripts.build:copy: cp -r src/css dist/ && cp -r src/html dist/ && cp -r src/icons dist/ && cp src/manifest.json dist/
scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:copy
scripts.test: echo 'Tests temporarily disabled during migration' && exit 0
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../lexin-extension.zip .
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
